snippet: Only after his death did the authorities discover what had been hidden in the Hudson Valley home where James Nichols lived for decades.
abstract: Discovery of JoAnn Nichols's body in Poughkeepsie, NY, home after 2012 death of her husband James L Nichols Jr confirms suspicions that he killed her when she vanished in 1985; despite police investigation, private investigation and years of cold case work, Nichols was never arrested or publicly named a suspect in his wife's disappearance, and police never served him with a search warrant for the house.
lead_paragraph: Only after his death did the authorities discover what had been hidden in the Hudson Valley home where James Nichols lived for decades.

headline.main: In Cluttered Home, a Dark Secret 3 Decades Old
headline.print_headline: In Cluttered Home, a Dark Secret 3 Decades Old
